name: Back By Day
description:
Falling off the Moon and landing in an unknown forest, a little star must find its way back home! But that's not all: the star's power has been weakened as star fragments have been scattered around the forest! If must find its way through the forest, collecting its lost power in order to jump back to the moon.

This 2D platformer is all about a little rabbit shaped star, with the ability to jump really high. But that power has been reduced, so it must collect the fragments of stars that fell down with it, in order to launch itself higher and make it back to the Moon.

Josh Baker - Programming

Thomas Baker - Music

Lauren Gamboa - Art
